sub_title: Commercial Finance Analytics manager at Bayer Crop Science
summary:
International leader with 10+ years of broad and diverse experience in finance,  business and marketing analysis, business strategy, change and transformation management and external audit. Acquired a solid E2E business acumen with strong determination and collaborative results driven mindset. Passionate leader actively focusing on influencing decision-making process and on shaping the business with proven record of building trustful relationships with stakeholder to achieve great results.

Core Skills:
- Passionate and structured leader influencing decision making process, with high people focus
- Pricing performance and Sales Effectiveness, pricing governance and process, pricing corridors, value- based pricing methods
- Competitive intelligence and Market assessments, E2E business insights
- Product Launch, advancements, customer segmentation and lifecycle analytics 
- Project management, stakeholders' management and cross functional collaboration
- Business and organizational transformation and integration
- S&OP planning and brand planning
- Commercial finance modelling, budgeting and long-range planning, risk management and external audit

profile_positions.description:
•	In Charge of the corn seeds, sel herbicides and licensing financial strategic planning and end to end crop strategy development with high focus on new business models including developing business case for Smart corn and crop system offering.
•	Transforming and co leading finance integration planning leveraging various process to ensure process reflects inputs of commercial strategic, S&OP, and external drivers.
•	Leading strategic pricing process and governance of full bag pricing corn seeds. Driving pricing analytics and profitability approach with a mission of raising awareness and game changing to value proposition selling.
•	Leading global digital transformation roadmap to establish commercial - finance insight ecosystem, pricing and competitive analytics offering to + 500 stakeholders to optimizing the way of working with significant workload reduction and with notable change management approach. Bringing EMEA recognition of the best practice across all the regions.
profile_positions.title: EMEA Regional Commercial Finance Analytics Manager Corn & Herbicides & Licensing

profile_positions.description:
1) Business partner for crop leads and executives for strategic & long-range financial planning and for developing integrated solutions brand plans and financial analytics to provide visibility on sustainable growth and to capture the right business opportunities.
2) Co-led strategic projects such as Sales effectiveness and MF optimization, Market data intelligence , cost to serve and RADL value tracking & modeling to optimize sales opportunities and transform to new business models.
3) Co-led the go to Market and financial launch of new created digital solution for the first-time digital business model paid in EMEA (Aquatek).
4) Co-led or contributed as project member in key integration work-streams for Bayer/Monsanto legacies integration: Market data intelligence, sales and operations planning and pricing management 
4) Led CP S&OP intermediate process design and establishment where after coordinated full integration, automation  and transformation in sync with Crop Protection S&OP process.
5) Led global project the Middle up / strategic planning process to assure global process integration with the collaboration of cross functions teams and global executives. Drove the adoption of to be process.
profile_positions.title: Commercial Finance Business Partner Integrated Solutions

profile_positions.description:
- Responsible for strategic & long range financial planning and for developing integrated solutions brand plans and financial analytics that support sustainable growth and capture the right business opportunities.
- Together with Business stakeholders leading strategic projects such as DEKALB SMART, Market data intelligence and sales effectiveness value tracking & modeling to support sales optimization and digital transformation.
- Partner cross functionally with brand managers, business leads, FP&A teams, Accounting teams, marketing and commercial teams, corporate teams to roll out strategic and COE methodologies and initiatives.
profile_positions.title: MPM Finance Business Partner Integrated Solutions

profile_positions.description:
- Led the financial strategic planning, budgeting, forecasting and developed analysis for Marketing and Commercial Business units. Presented on yearly and monthly basis the strategy planning and financial fcst to EMEA leadership and to Corporate HQ in Sunnyvale, California.
- Led and supported centralization and automation of several projects achieving system sustainability and process & cost improvement for the Marketing department. Projects such as digital lead generation & Finance Dashboard per area/segment.
- Continuously drove process improvement via compilation and processing of stakeholder feedback, as well as prioritization of projects and improvements. Acted as a mentor to marketing managers and trainees for procedural guidance on deliverables and processes.
- Performed financial and business analyses of MDF (NetApp Marketing Development Fund: reimbursement for approved partner-requested marketing and sales activities). Prepared quarterly reports and messaging to EMEA and Global leadership.
profile_positions.title: NetApp Finance Business Partner

profile_positions.description:
- Performed strategic business planning and monthly financial forecasting for INS & Mobile Business units as well as analyzed and reported the results to HQ.
- Forecasted the monthly working capital and analyzed the variances from the previous forecast compared to the actual figures.
- Acted as member of IFRS team: coordinated and monito­red the correct implementation of IFRS within the Business Market.
- Supervised financial controllers in the process of correct implementation of IFRS and writing memo’s for implementing changes regarding IFRS.
- Acted as member of the balance-review team: quarterly review of the balance sheet of the Business Market and coordinated this process.
profile_positions.title: B2B KPN Finance Business Partner INS & Mobile

profile_positions.description:
- Analyzed, monitored and reported on the costs of more than 50% of the total costs of Netco.
- Led the annual operating & budget planning and monthly/quarterly forecasts and early warnings.
- Supported the development of financial strategic plans with established timelines agreed with business partners.
- Analyzed, forecasted and reported on the personnel costs specifically (high sensitive level management letter).
- Forecasted working capital and analyzed variances from the previous forecast compared to the actual figures.
profile_positions.title: NETCO KPN Finance Business Partner

profile_positions.description:
- Performed audit activities on the financial statement, balance sheet, income statement and cash flow statement for corporate engagements. Prepared reports, commentaries and opinion letter presenting the findings and recommendations.
- Investigated the levels of financial risk within organizations and identified if and where processes are not working as they should and advised on changes to be made (SOX control and internal control).
- Supervising first and second assistant auditors and interns.
profile_positions.title: Corporate Market Senior Auditor

profile_positions.description: Writing a thesis about Financial Instruments IAS 39
profile_positions.title: Corporate Auditor Internship
